class.name: Phaser.Cache

parameters.name: game
parameters.help: A reference to the currently running game.

class.help: A game only has one instance of a Cache and it is used to store all externally loaded assets such as images, sounds\nand data files as a result of Loader calls. Cached items use string based keys for look-up.

public.name: addBinary
public.help: Add a binary object in to the cache.

parameters.name: key
parameters.help: Asset key for this binary data.

parameters.name: binaryData
parameters.help: The binary object to be addded to the cache.

public.name: addBitmapData

returns.help: The BitmapData object to be addded to the cache.

public.help: Add a BitmapData object in to the cache.

parameters.name: key
parameters.help: Asset key for this BitmapData.

parameters.name: bitmapData
parameters.help: The BitmapData object to be addded to the cache.

parameters.name: frameData
parameters.help: Optional FrameData set associated with the given BitmapData.

public.name: addBitmapFont
public.help: Add a new Bitmap Font to the Cache.

parameters.name: key
parameters.help: The unique key by which you will reference this object.

parameters.name: url
parameters.help: URL of this font xml file.

parameters.name: data
parameters.help: Extra font data.

parameters.name: xmlData
parameters.help: Texture atlas frames data.

parameters.name: xSpacing
parameters.help: If you'd like to add additional horizontal spacing between the characters then set the pixel value here.

parameters.name: ySpacing
parameters.help: If you'd like to add additional vertical spacing between the lines then set the pixel value here.

public.name: addCanvas
public.help: Add a new canvas object in to the cache.

parameters.name: key
parameters.help: Asset key for this canvas.

parameters.name: canvas
parameters.help: Canvas DOM element.

parameters.name: context
parameters.help: Render context of this canvas.

public.name: addImage
public.help: Adds an Image file into the Cache. The file must have already been loaded, typically via Phaser.Loader.

parameters.name: key
parameters.help: The unique key by which you will reference this object.

parameters.name: url
parameters.help: URL of this image file.

parameters.name: data
parameters.help: Extra image data.

public.name: addJSON
public.help: Add a new json object into the cache.

parameters.name: key
parameters.help: Asset key for the json data.

parameters.name: url
parameters.help: URL of this json data file.

parameters.name: data
parameters.help: Extra json data.

public.name: addRenderTexture
public.help: Add a new Phaser.RenderTexture in to the cache.

parameters.name: key
parameters.help: The unique key by which you will reference this object.

parameters.name: texture
parameters.help: The texture to use as the base of the RenderTexture.

public.name: addSound
public.help: Adds a Sound file into the Cache. The file must have already been loaded, typically via Phaser.Loader.

parameters.name: key
parameters.help: Asset key for the sound.

parameters.name: url
parameters.help: URL of this sound file.

parameters.name: data
parameters.help: Extra sound data.

parameters.name: webAudio
parameters.help: True if the file is using web audio.

parameters.name: audioTag
parameters.help: True if the file is using legacy HTML audio.

public.name: addSpriteSheet
public.help: Add a new sprite sheet in to the cache.

parameters.name: key
parameters.help: The unique key by which you will reference this object.

parameters.name: url
parameters.help: URL of this sprite sheet file.

parameters.name: data
parameters.help: Extra sprite sheet data.

parameters.name: frameWidth
parameters.help: Width of the sprite sheet.

parameters.name: frameHeight
parameters.help: Height of the sprite sheet.

parameters.name: frameMax
parameters.help: How many frames stored in the sprite sheet. If -1 then it divides the whole sheet evenly.

parameters.name: margin
parameters.help: If the frames have been drawn with a margin, specify the amount here.

parameters.name: spacing
parameters.help: If the frames have been drawn with spacing between them, specify the amount here.

public.name: addText
public.help: Add a new text data.

parameters.name: key
parameters.help: Asset key for the text data.

parameters.name: url
parameters.help: URL of this text data file.

parameters.name: data
parameters.help: Extra text data.

public.name: addTextureAtlas
public.help: Add a new texture atlas to the Cache.

parameters.name: key
parameters.help: The unique key by which you will reference this object.

parameters.name: url
parameters.help: URL of this texture atlas file.

parameters.name: data
parameters.help: Extra texture atlas data.

parameters.name: atlasData
parameters.help: - Texture atlas frames data.

parameters.name: format
parameters.help: The format of the texture atlas.

public.name: addTilemap
public.help: Add a new physics data object to the Cache.

parameters.name: key
parameters.help: The unique key by which you will reference this object.

parameters.name: url
parameters.help: URL of the physics json data.

parameters.name: JSONData
parameters.help: The physics data object (a JSON file).

parameters.name: format
parameters.help: The format of the physics data.

public.name: addXML
public.help: Add a new xml object into the cache.

parameters.name: key
parameters.help: Asset key for the xml file.

parameters.name: url
parameters.help: URL of this xml file.

parameters.name: data
parameters.help: Extra text data.

public.name: checkBinaryKey

returns.help: True if the key exists, otherwise false.

public.help: Checks if the given key exists in the Binary Cache.

parameters.name: key
parameters.help: Asset key of the binary file to check is in the Cache.

public.name: checkBitmapDataKey

returns.help: True if the key exists, otherwise false.

public.help: Checks if the given key exists in the BitmapData Cache.

parameters.name: key
parameters.help: Asset key of the BitmapData to check is in the Cache.

public.name: checkBitmapFontKey

returns.help: True if the key exists, otherwise false.

public.help: Checks if the given key exists in the BitmapFont Cache.

parameters.name: key
parameters.help: Asset key of the BitmapFont to check is in the Cache.

public.name: checkCanvasKey

returns.help: True if the key exists, otherwise false.

public.help: Checks if the given key exists in the Canvas Cache.

parameters.name: key
parameters.help: Asset key of the canvas to check is in the Cache.

public.name: checkImageKey

returns.help: True if the key exists, otherwise false.

public.help: Checks if the given key exists in the Image Cache. Note that this also includes Texture Atlases, Sprite Sheets and Retro Fonts.

parameters.name: key
parameters.help: Asset key of the image to check is in the Cache.

public.name: checkJSONKey

returns.help: True if the key exists, otherwise false.

public.help: Checks if the given key exists in the JSON Cache.

parameters.name: key
parameters.help: Asset key of the JSON file to check is in the Cache.

public.name: checkKey

returns.help: True if the key exists, otherwise false.

public.help: Checks if a key for the given cache object type exists.

parameters.name: type
parameters.help: The Cache type to check against. I.e. Phaser.Cache.CANVAS, Phaser.Cache.IMAGE, Phaser.Cache.JSON, etc.

parameters.name: key
parameters.help: Asset key of the image to check is in the Cache.

public.name: checkPhysicsKey

returns.help: True if the key exists, otherwise false.

public.help: Checks if the given key exists in the Physics Cache.

parameters.name: key
parameters.help: Asset key of the physics data file to check is in the Cache.

public.name: checkSoundKey

returns.help: True if the key exists, otherwise false.

public.help: Checks if the given key exists in the Sound Cache.

parameters.name: key
parameters.help: Asset key of the sound file to check is in the Cache.

public.name: checkTextKey

returns.help: True if the key exists, otherwise false.

public.help: Checks if the given key exists in the Text Cache.

parameters.name: key
parameters.help: Asset key of the text file to check is in the Cache.

public.name: checkTextureKey

returns.help: True if the key exists, otherwise false.

public.help: Checks if the given key exists in the Texture Cache.

parameters.name: key
parameters.help: Asset key of the image to check is in the Cache.

public.name: checkTilemapKey

returns.help: True if the key exists, otherwise false.

public.help: Checks if the given key exists in the Tilemap Cache.

parameters.name: key
parameters.help: Asset key of the Tilemap to check is in the Cache.

public.name: checkUrl

returns.help: True if the url exists, otherwise false.

public.help: Checks if the given URL has been loaded into the Cache.

parameters.name: url
parameters.help: The url to check for in the cache.

public.name: checkXMLKey

returns.help: True if the key exists, otherwise false.

public.help: Checks if the given key exists in the XML Cache.

parameters.name: key
parameters.help: Asset key of the XML file to check is in the Cache.

public.name: decodedSound
public.help: Add a new decoded sound.

parameters.name: key
parameters.help: Asset key for the sound.

parameters.name: data
parameters.help: Extra sound data.

public.name: destroy
public.help: Clears the cache. Removes every local cache object reference.

public.name: getBinary

returns.help: The binary data object.

public.help: Get binary data by key.

parameters.name: key
parameters.help: Asset key of the binary data object to retrieve from the Cache.

public.name: getBitmapData

returns.help: The requested BitmapData object if found, or null if not.

public.help: Get a BitmapData object from the cache by its key.

parameters.name: key
parameters.help: Asset key of the BitmapData object to retrieve from the Cache.

public.name: getBitmapFont

returns.help: The requested BitmapFont object if found, or null if not.

public.help: Get a BitmapFont object from the cache by its key.

parameters.name: key
parameters.help: Asset key of the BitmapFont object to retrieve from the Cache.

public.name: getCanvas

returns.help: The canvas object.

public.help: Get a canvas object from the cache by its key.

parameters.name: key
parameters.help: Asset key of the canvas to retrieve from the Cache.

public.name: getFrame

returns.help: The frame data.

public.help: Get a single frame by key. You'd only do this to get the default Frame created for a non-atlas/spritesheet image.

parameters.name: key
parameters.help: Asset key of the frame data to retrieve from the Cache.

public.name: getFrameByIndex

returns.help: The frame object.

public.help: Get a single frame out of a frameData set by key.

parameters.name: key
parameters.help: Asset key of the frame data to retrieve from the Cache.

public.name: getFrameByName

returns.help: The frame object.

public.help: Get a single frame out of a frameData set by key.

parameters.name: key
parameters.help: Asset key of the frame data to retrieve from the Cache.

public.name: getFrameCount

returns.help: Then number of frames. 0 if the image is not found.

public.help: Get the number of frames in this image.

parameters.name: key
parameters.help: Asset key of the image you want.

public.name: getFrameData

returns.help: The frame data.

public.help: Get frame data by key.

parameters.name: key
parameters.help: Asset key of the frame data to retrieve from the Cache.

parameters.name: map
parameters.help: The asset map to get the frameData from, for example `Phaser.Cache.IMAGE`.

public.name: getImage

returns.help: The image data if found in the Cache, otherwise `null`.

public.help: Get image data by key.

parameters.name: key
parameters.help: Asset key of the image to retrieve from the Cache.

public.name: getJSON

returns.help: The JSON object.

public.help: Get a JSON object by key from the cache.

parameters.name: key
parameters.help: Asset key of the json object to retrieve from the Cache.

public.name: getKeys

returns.help: The array of item keys.

public.help: Gets all keys used by the Cache for the given data type.

parameters.name: type
parameters.help: The type of Cache keys you wish to get. Can be Cache.CANVAS, Cache.IMAGE, Cache.SOUND, etc.

public.name: getPhysicsData

returns.help: The requested physics object data if found.

public.help: Get a physics data object from the cache by its key. You can get either the entire data set, a single object or a single fixture of an object from it.

parameters.name: key
parameters.help: Asset key of the physics data object to retrieve from the Cache.

parameters.name: object
parameters.help: If specified it will return just the physics object that is part of the given key, if null it will return them all.

parameters.name: fixtureKey
parameters.help: Fixture key of fixture inside an object. This key can be set per fixture with the Phaser Exporter.

public.name: getSound

returns.help: The sound object.

public.help: Get sound by key.

parameters.name: key
parameters.help: Asset key of the sound to retrieve from the Cache.

public.name: getSoundData

returns.help: The sound data.

public.help: Get sound data by key.

parameters.name: key
parameters.help: Asset key of the sound to retrieve from the Cache.

public.name: getText

returns.help: The text data.

public.help: Get text data by key.

parameters.name: key
parameters.help: Asset key of the text data to retrieve from the Cache.

public.name: getTexture

returns.help: The RenderTexture object.

public.help: Get a RenderTexture by key.

parameters.name: key
parameters.help: Asset key of the RenderTexture to retrieve from the Cache.

public.name: getTextureFrame

returns.help: The frame data.

public.help: Get a single texture frame by key. You'd only do this to get the default Frame created for a non-atlas/spritesheet image.

parameters.name: key
parameters.help: Asset key of the frame to retrieve from the Cache.

public.name: getTilemapData

returns.help: The raw tilemap data in CSV or JSON format.

public.help: Get tilemap data by key.

parameters.name: key
parameters.help: Asset key of the tilemap data to retrieve from the Cache.

public.name: getUrl

returns.help: The cached object.

public.help: Get a cached object by the URL.

parameters.name: url
parameters.help: The url for the object loaded to get from the cache.

public.name: getXML

returns.help: The XML object.

public.help: Get a XML object by key from the cache.

parameters.name: key
parameters.help: Asset key of the XML object to retrieve from the Cache.

public.name: isSoundDecoded

returns.help: The decoded state of the Sound object.

public.help: Check if the given sound has finished decoding.

parameters.name: key
parameters.help: Asset key of the sound in the Cache.

public.name: isSoundReady

returns.help: True if the sound is decoded and the device is not touch locked.

public.help: Check if the given sound is ready for playback. A sound is considered ready when it has finished decoding and the device is no longer touch locked.

parameters.name: key
parameters.help: Asset key of the sound in the Cache.

public.name: reloadSound
public.help: Reload a Sound file from the server.

parameters.name: key
parameters.help: Asset key for the sound.

public.name: reloadSoundComplete
public.help: Fires the onSoundUnlock event when the sound has completed reloading.

parameters.name: key
parameters.help: Asset key for the sound.

public.name: removeBinary
public.help: Removes a binary file from the cache.

parameters.name: key
parameters.help: Key of the asset you want to remove.

public.name: removeBitmapData
public.help: Removes a bitmap data from the cache.

parameters.name: key
parameters.help: Key of the asset you want to remove.

public.name: removeBitmapFont
public.help: Removes a bitmap font from the cache.

parameters.name: key
parameters.help: Key of the asset you want to remove.

public.name: removeCanvas
public.help: Removes a canvas from the cache.

parameters.name: key
parameters.help: Key of the asset you want to remove.

public.name: removeImage
public.help: Removes an image from the cache and optionally from the Pixi.BaseTextureCache as well.

parameters.name: key
parameters.help: Key of the asset you want to remove.

parameters.name: removeFromPixi
parameters.help: Should this image also be removed from the Pixi BaseTextureCache?

public.name: removeJSON
public.help: Removes a json object from the cache.

parameters.name: key
parameters.help: Key of the asset you want to remove.

public.name: removePhysics
public.help: Removes a physics data file from the cache.

parameters.name: key
parameters.help: Key of the asset you want to remove.

public.name: removeSound
public.help: Removes a sound from the cache.

parameters.name: key
parameters.help: Key of the asset you want to remove.

public.name: removeText
public.help: Removes a text from the cache.

parameters.name: key
parameters.help: Key of the asset you want to remove.

public.name: removeTilemap
public.help: Removes a tilemap from the cache.

parameters.name: key
parameters.help: Key of the asset you want to remove.

public.name: removeXML
public.help: Removes a xml object from the cache.

parameters.name: key
parameters.help: Key of the asset you want to remove.

public.name: updateFrameData
public.help: Replaces a set of frameData with a new Phaser.FrameData object.

parameters.name: key
parameters.help: The unique key by which you will reference this object.

parameters.name: frameData
parameters.help: The new FrameData.

public.name: updateSound
public.help: Updates the sound object in the cache.

parameters.name: key
parameters.help: Asset key for the sound.

protected.name: addDefaultImage
protected.help: Adds a default image to be used in special cases such as WebGL Filters. Is mapped to the key __default.

protected.name: addMissingImage
protected.help: Adds an image to be used when a key is wrong / missing. Is mapped to the key __missing.

private.name: _resolveUrl

returns.help: The resolved URL.

private.help: Resolves a URL to its absolute form.

parameters.name: url
parameters.help: The URL to resolve.

public.name: _cacheMap
public.inlineHelp: Const to cache object look-up array.

public.name: onSoundUnlock
public.inlineHelp: This event is dispatched when the sound system is unlocked via a touch event on cellular devices.

private.name: _urlResolver
private.inlineHelp: Used to resolve URLs to the absolute path.

private.name: _urlTemp
private.inlineHelp: Temporary variable to hold a resolved url.
